text:
It's official: Kim Zolciak-Biermann and Kroy Biermann just won Valentine's Day. The Don't Be Tardy couple is currently on a romantic getaway, and it might just be their steamiest one yet.

Kim recently shared some photos from her beach vacay with her husband, and she decided to go topless in one. We warned you that these pics are hot, hot, hot.

Partial nudity aside, these photos are all about Kim showing her love for Kroy during the most romantic time of year. "I would go to the end of this earth for you my love, my best friend, my strength, my heart, and my world," Kim captioned a pair of photos on Instagram (swipe right to see more).

At least one person doesn't seem to be a huge fan of the photos. Kim and Kroy's daughter, Ariana Biermann, wrote "where is ur top?" in the comments to the photo. However, she also commented that Kim and Kroy are "parent goals," so it's not all teenage embarrassment going on here.

Kim later shared some more fierce photos of herself and Kroy, who could be seen rocking one of his signature Speedos, where she works the sand like a runway at New York Fashion Week in her strapless leopard-print bikini.

Follow me on Snap KimZBiermann A post shared by Kim Zolciak-Biermann (@kimzolciakbiermann) on Feb 13, 2018 at 11:21am PST

When Kim and the rest of the Biermann bunch aren't taking their hometown of Atlanta by storm, they can often be seen at the beach. Kim has previously spoken about her special connection to the beach and the ocean, which is why the couple decided to renew their vows in Turks and Caicos in May 2017, which was featured last season of Don't Be Tardy.

See more of the touching (and breathtaking!) vow renewal ceremony, below.
title: Kim Zolciak-Biermann Shares Her Steamiest (and Most Topless) Photos With Kroy Biermann Yet
